command.name: create

help.short: The name of the virtual machine.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$labVirtualMachine.properties.artifacts" options="artifacts" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$labVirtualMachine.properties.artifacts[].parameters" options="parameters">
<arg type="array" var="$labVirtualMachine.properties.dataDiskParameters" options="data-disk-parameters" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$labVirtualMachine.properties.networkInterface.sharedPublicIpAddressConfiguration.inboundNatRules" options="inbound-nat-rules">
<arg type="array" var="$labVirtualMachine.properties.scheduleParameters" options="schedule-parameters" group="Properties">
<help short="The time zone ID (e.g. China Standard Time, Greenland Standard Time, Pacific Standard time, etc.). The possible values for this property can be found in `IReadOnlyCollection TimeZoneConverter.TZConvert.KnownWindowsTimeZoneIds` (https://github.com/mattjohnsonpint/TimeZoneConverter/blob/main/README.md)"/>
<arg type="array" var="$labVirtualMachine.properties.scheduleParameters[].properties.weeklyRecurrence.weekdays" options="weekdays">
